701696f-a.title: Bronx: Reservoir Oval East - Reservoir Place
701696f-a.text:
(1) Reservoir Oval East, east side, north from a point south of Reservoir Place, to and including Putnam Place. The two unit 6-story apartment house is at the N.E. corner of the latter Street and is called the Oritsch Hall. On the left is the boundary of Williams Bridge Reservoir.

June 6, 1928.

(2) A closer view of the same.

June 6, 1928.
701696f-a.folder: Reservoir Oval East & Reservoir Place, Bronx, NY
